Author: Ari Edelkind
Comment: Please apply patch http://cr.i3wm.org/patch/530 (http://bugs.i3wm.org/query/ticket/1242) before testing this patch.  That bug became apparent while working on this.

Author: Ari Edelkind
Comment: The "bind->keycode > 0" bit is left in place here just in case the keycode is set somewhere despite the symbol being non-null.  If this never happens, it isn't necessary.

Author: Ari Edelkind
Comment: XCB_GRAB_ANY is actually 0, so this is no longer a valid check.
